amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used to provide new loan guarantee commitments under section 1705 of the Energy Policy Act of 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to provide new loan guarantees commitments under section 1705 of the Energy Policy Act of 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blackburn amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A032) offered by Mrs. Blackburn.
